title: fat serif typeface
content:
Hi all, as a child of the eighties I’ve got wide typeface in my blood. i found this the other day and id really like to know what it is. if anyone could point me toward other typefaces of this ilk id be a happy patron. thanks,

Redd .

[IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/208k304.png[/IMG]

incidentally this is the first serif font Ive seen like this

 [‹ Name this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605010247/http:/typophile.com/node/46016 "Go to previous forum topic") [‘The Five’ modular, almost Gridnik-like ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605010247/http:/typophile.com/node/46013 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Redd

comments.content:
Hi Brian,

your photo shows the typeface from a heavy angle – that complicates the matter.  
Have a look at [Melior](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605010247/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/melior/familytree.html) by [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605010247/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%252BZapf).  
F
